alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Tippecanoe; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 12:04PM EST until February 23 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood River near Edinburgh. East Fork White River at Shoals. Tippecanoe River near Delphi. Wildcat Creek near Lafayette. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg. .Rainfall last night and this morning of around an inch to an inch and a half along with a mixed precipitation system coming Wednesday night through Thursday night will create additional flooding on area rivers. Minor flooding is expected for most locations, but moderate flooding is possible on lower parts of the White and Wabash. Flooding along the main stem rivers is expected to continue into at least the first week of March. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tippecanoe River near Delphi. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Low agricultural lands, river parks and a few local roads flood along the Tippecanoe River. Oakdale Public Access Site flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 8.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by late this evening.
